summary: Contoso Wireless offers streaming services for a variety of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more. They provide on-demand streaming services with movies, TV shows, music and games, as well as live streaming services with sports, news and other events. Prices start at $9.99 per month for on-demand services and $19.99 per month for live streaming services. There are no additional fees or hidden costs associated with the product, and they offer a 30-day money back guarantee if customers are not satisfied. Customers can sign up on their website or call 1-800-555-1234 for assistance.
